params.WFCommentActionText:
Lucy - AI Assistant by Neurogram and twilsonco

 - Natural Language Driven
 - Uses tool Shortcuts to interact with apps/web, run code, etc.
 - Custom Tools Supported
 - Run via Siri

Shortcut input:
